titles.title: A bill to amend title II of the Social Security Act to phase out the earnings test over a 4-year period for individuals who have attained age 65.

action.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.
Referred to Subcommittee on Social Security.

term.name: Old age, survivors and disability insurance

bill.summary: 3/11/1987--Introduced. Amends title II (Old Age, Survivors and Disability Insurance) of the Social Security Act to increase for each year from 1988 through 1991 the amount of outside income which beneficiaries who have attained retirement age may earn without incurring a reduction in benefits. Removes such income limitation thereafter.
